DOC.brief_summary: Infant phase : To determine safety production antibody group C meningococcal conjugate vaccine ( MnCC ) , give 2 , 3 , 4 month age routine vaccine . Booster phase : To compare safety production antibody MnCC without MMR compare antibody response produce low dose plain polysaccharide vaccine way investigate immune memory
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Tolerance Conjugate Meningococcal C Vaccine Infants
DOC.criteria: Healthy infant 710 week age eligible receive routine immunization
